member.name: T:JetBrains.SourceView.PdbSourceInfo.InvalidRange
member.summary: Special-purpose class which describes illegal source code range. Responds with "InvalidOperationException" for all meaningful methods except for "IsValid" and "FilePath" since (!) even illegal offsets can point to the valid files (this occures often with generated source files in WPF and silverlight).

member.name: T:JetBrains.SourceView.PdbSourceInfo.SourceCodeRangeFull
member.summary: General-purpose source code range, with no memory optimization for storing values for lines and columns.
